body: Hi Christian, Are you looking for values that are falling on the surface or the values that comes off the surface? In case of the latter, you can look to solutions with Radiance. The former though involves thermal properties of the materials and is something that you want to check using the results of EP. I have never done it myself so I don't know the answer off the top of my head but you can check EnergyPlus Input/Output reference to find related outputs.
